data.message: I feel you I also grew up in the D just revisited my childhood home on 8 and Eastwood amazing memories and proud to know it still stands I was relapsing myself with another depression episode but I'm slowly getting back to my music career day by day studio next week I gotta finish this album for myself and for the people of Detroit I'm real and true and we need much love for ALL of our people God rap music and Eminem is my ONLY outlet I hope I get to thank you one day in person for saving my life you will always b a rap god legend in my eyes and you deserve an iconic billboard award for best true rap artist from the D for the D you got my vote all the way so I'm gonna stop being a baby and keep doing Shady you the illist baby 4evs
